data.title: 2016 IEEE International Conference on Acoustics, Speech, and Signal Processing
data.text:
AISpeechâArtificial Intelligent Speech, founded by intelligent speech technology team from Cambridge, is the only one owns the human-machine interaction technology in China. AISpeech is also listed in the few countries, in the world, which have proprietary intellectual property rights and integrated voice technology in both Chinese and English. AISpeech has been awarded high and new technology enterprise by Chinese and British government.

AISpeech provides series of professional solutions for smart home, intelligent vehicle, wearable device and intelligent robot to satisfy individual needs from developers.To meet different demands, AISpeech integrates basic voice technolgy and dialogue intelligence into our quantified solutions. The solutions are provided in the form of cloud service, local processing, or the combination of these two, to help developers experience the natural language human-machine interaction platform at the lowest cost. AISpeech can also help smart devices upgrade from listening and speaking to understanding and performing.

Since established, AISpeech has access to investments from Lagend Star, Tus Park Ventures, Ali and got Cambirdge Business Award, Cambridge DowningFunding, UK Government Research and Development Funding, National Electronic Development Funding, etc. AISpeech is also supported by National Science and Technology Foundation. AISpeech has established companies in Shenzhen and Suzhou, set up office in Beijing, and founded intelligent human-computer interaction lab in Shanghai Jiaotong University.The Amazon Alexa team focuses on bringing user-delighting, voice-activated experiences to Amazon customers. The Alexa team first began with the development of Amazon Echo, a new category of device designed entirely around your voice. It's always ready, connected, and fast â just ask for information, music, news, weather, and more. Echo begins working as soon as it detects the wake word. Echo is also an expertly tuned speaker that can fill any room with immersive sound.

But the team of speech scientists, voice designers, developers, and more didnât stop there. It is still Day One for the team to work on audio, automatic speech recognition, and natural language solutions that revolutionize how customers interact with Amazonâs products and services. We are currently located in Seattle, Boston, Pittsburgh, Sunnyvale, and the EU, and continue to grow.Baidu, Inc. is the leading Chinese language Internet search provider. As a technology- based media company, Baidu aims to provide the best and most equitable way for people to find they're looking for. In addition to serving individual Internet search users, Baidu provides an effective platform for businesses to reach potential customers. Baidu's ADSs trade on the NASDAQ Global Select Market under the symbol "BIDU". Currently, ten ADSs represent one Class A ordinary share.

Baidu was founded in 2000 by Internet search pioneer Robin Li, with the mission of providing the best and most equitable way for people to find what theyâre looking for. Over the past 15 years we have strived to fulfill this mission by listening to our users and truly understanding their needs. To provide intelligent, relevant search results for the tens of billions of queries that are entered into our search platform every day, we focus on powering the best technology optimized for up-to-date local tastes and preferences, with a deep, nuanced insights into the Chinese language. In recent years, weâve transitioned from a PC-centric to a mobile-first company, and currently over 50 percent of our revenues come from mobile. With a leading position in mobile search, mobile maps, and app distribution, Baidu is well positioned to capture the next opportunity: Connecting people with services in closed-loop transactions.

Beijing Huiting Technology Corporation is a professional multimedia data service provider. Our corpus production team has more than ten years of experiences in providing high quality corpus for speech recognition, speech synthesis, speech quality evaluation, and multimedia research. Our corpus production team is supported by an outstanding research and development team, comprised by the researchers and engineers from the Chinese Academy of Sciences Research Institutes and top universities. Our corpus is recorded in our ITU standardized recording chamber with professional equipment. During the corpus production process, we supervised the whole workflow ensuring a flawless labeling process for our high quality data services.

At present, we are able to provide more than 50 speech and multi-media data services and still expanding. We are looking forward to provide satisfactory data service for you.Cambridge University Press is a not-for-profit organization that advances learning, knowledge and research worldwide. It is an integral part of the University of Cambridge and for centuries has extended its research and teaching activities through an extensive range of academic and educational books, journals, and digital products.

Visit our stand at ICASSP to browse our latest publications and chat to our editorial and marketing team about how to become a Cambridge University Press author.CRC Press is a premier publisher of science, technology, and medical reference books, textbooks and online content, reaching around the globe to collect essential reference material and the latest advances for researchers, academics, professionals, and students. Besides print products, CRC Press also provides the award-winning CRCnetBASE eBook collections. CRC Press is a member of Taylor & Francis Group, an Informa business. Our mission is to serve the needs of scientists and the community at large by working with capable researchers and professionals from across the world to produce the most accurate and up to date science, technology, and medical resources.

As one of the world's largest publishers and with a history of two centuries, Taylor & Francis maintains offices throughout the world including the UK, Holland, the USA, Brazil, Singapore, China, Japan, Korea, Australia, and India. Publishing more than 2350 journals and approximately 5,000 new books each year, Taylor and Francis Group has a backlist in excess of 100,000 specialist titles.IFLYTEK CO.,LTD.(iFLYTEK)is a national key software enterprise dedicated to the research of intelligent speech and language technologies, development of software and chip products, provision of speech information services, and integration of E-government systems. The intelligent speech technology of iFLYTEK, the core technology of the company, represents the top level in the world.

Established in 1999, iFLYTEK was listed in the Shenzhen Stock Exchange in 2008 (stock code: 002230). With vigorous support from major shareholders including USTC Holdings Co., Ltd., Shanghai Guangxin, and Legend Capital, iFLYTEK boasts the longest fundamental research history, the largest professional research team, the greatest capital investment, the best evaluation results, and the largest market share among all business entities in the speech technology field in China. IT4YOU is an international developer of innovative technologies in the field of speech intelligibility and

audio signal processing. Our applications:

SPOY KARAOKE: new technology of vocal transformation. Sing as you can, sound as a star!

URBANDENOISER PLAYER: the first audio player adjusting music to user's hearing level with an alternative to active noise reduction. Winner of Microsoft European App Cup, 2015.

PETRALEXÂ®: The family of applications with the functionality of hearing aids and other sound reproducing systems, running on multimedia platforms such as smartphone, tablet, PC for people with hearing loss.

PETRALEX SPEECH COMMUNICATION: new speech technologies in communication with customers of contact-, call-centres. Persuasive and expressive voice. Improvement of agent's auditory perception.

CONFERENCE PLUGIN: it allows users to listen to interlocutors with comfort in ambient noise and it improves the quality of speech.Wiley is a global provider of content-enabled solutions that improve outcomes in research, education, and professional practice. Our core businesses produce scientific, technical, medical, and scholarly journals, reference works, books, database services, and advertising; professional books, subscription products, certification and training services and online applications; and education content and services including integrated online teaching and learning resources for undergraduate and graduate students and lifelong learners. Founded in 1807, John Wiley & Sons, Inc. (NYSE: JWa, JWb), has been a valued source of information and understanding for more than 200 years, helping people around the world meet their needs and fulfill their aspirations. Wiley and its acquired companies have published the works of more than 450 Nobel laureates in all categories: Literature, Economics, Physiology or Medicine, Physics, Chemistry, and Peace. Wiley's global headquarters are located in Hoboken, New Jersey, with operations in the U.S., Europe, Asia, Canada, and Australia. The Company's website can be accessed at http://www.wiley.comMicrosoft Corp (http://microsoft.com) is the world leader that develops and markets software, services and hardware that deliver new opportunities, greater convenience and enhanced value to people's lives. Microsoft has tremendous assets in the technical fields of ICASSP, particularly in the speech technologies that powers Cortana digital assistant experience on desktop and mobile devices, skype speech to speech translation, and Xbox Kinect voice search and command control. Microsoft also has deep expertise of machine learning including deep learning that powers a wide range of business applications including language processing and big data analytics.

Both Microsoft Research and engineering groups are hiring passionate engineers, scientists, and researchers who desire to make impact in real-world applications and in core technologies spanning a wide range of areas including, speech, dialogue, image, language, multimodality, data mining, machine learning (deep and shallow), business analytics, and artificial intelligence.Mobvoiï¼åºé¨é®é®ï¼ is an AI start-up company led by ex-Google scientists, and NLP& Voice Search experts. Itâs the only start-up in the Chinese market with independent core technologies including industry-leading speech recognition, natural language processing and vertical mobile search. The mission of the Company is to define next generation of human-machine interaction through consumer products.

After the success of voice search & interaction application (Chumenwenwen), in search of the best scenario of voice interaction, Mobvoi launched Ticwatch, a full-round designed smart watch running the 1st Chinese smart watch operating system Ticwear. It raised USD 1.3 million on JD crowdfunding platform in 2 weeks, proving itself a successful attempt to bring the AI technology to the consumer market.

And now, Mobvoi has formed a strategic partnership with Google, with the newly formed partnership, Android Wear users in China will now be able to enjoy voice search by Mobvoi and localized services, leveraging data provided by Mobvoi's local partners such as Sogou Map, Dianping, Ctrip, etc.

Through this collaboration, Google saw the very innovative approach of AI technologies and great possibilities in this start-up team, and quickly decided to make an investment, taking the company to USD 75 million in investment to date, also giving both sides more possibilities to cooperate in the future.Sogou is a leading Internet service provider of search engine, PC Client, mobile application and smart hardware. Since 2003, Sogou has launched Sogou Search, Input Method and Browser successively which formed its well-known âTriple Arrowsâ strategy. At present, Sogou has become one of the leading fast-growing Internet companies with its constant pursuit of innovation. A range of Sogouâs products own comparatively higher market shares in the industry. Sogou InputMethod, a breakthrough for Chinese words and phrase library, has take up 95 percent of market share.

With the mission of "helping users quickly and accurately obtain valuable personalized information and services through smart computing", Sogou is turning its focus to smart services and dedicating more efforts to develop the top-level self-developed voice and other artificial intelligent technologies. The voice technology has taken the leading position of the field, and well built in lots of Sogouâs products to improve the user experiences further. Sogou Input Method provides the largest speech recognition services of China. From 2015 daily average speech recogniton requests surpass 100 million. Moreover, Sogou has launched speech recognition service Cloud platform (http://openspeech.sogou.com) to provide voice technology for developers and users free of charge. In future, Sogou will adhere to provide more excellent services and be more innovative to continuously create values.

Since its founding in 1946, Sony has always been seeking to create unique products and lifestyles, bringing fresh emotion and wonders to its customers. In order to bring greater joy and entertainment to people around the world, we have in addition to Electronics expanded into new areas of business such as Games, Pictures, Music, Mobile Communications and Financial Services. Sony believes that today's rapid pace of change is a time of unlimited opportunities and possibilities.

Sony is committed to continually seeking unique and talented individuals who share our spirit in pursuing "Dreams", "Emotions", and "Innovations". We look for your enthusiasm, creativity and imagination and invite you to join us to create an exciting future together. If you have a dream, an imaginative mind and a passion to share your innovation with everyone, come and join us!Speechocean, as a well-known data resources and data services supplier, devotes itself to providing qualified databases and efficient services for its academic and industrial customers and help them create diversified values in the fields of Human Computer Interaction and Human Language Technology.

Speechocean is capable of providing various types of large databases and data-related services in many languages and accents such as data designing, collecting, transcribing, annotating, validating and linguistic services and other related processing services for many technical fields such as speech synthesis, speech recognition, machine translation, web search, nature language understanding, image recognition and etc.

According to customerâs specific requirement, we can also provide One-Stop Data Solution, which includes services of data design, data collection, data processing, modeling & model training, testing and evaluation. Please click "One-Stop Data Solution" for details.

During past 15 years, Speechocean has been providing its customers over 1000 databases and various types of customized services covering 110 languages and accents. Till now, Speechocean has established ten overseas offices equipped with experienced international teams and sophisticated project management process in Hong Kong, UK, Germany, Spain, Canada, Russia, and other countries and regions.

Based on its unique features of large-scale data solution capability with guaranty of high quality, cost optimization and fast delivery, Speechocean won great reputation and trust and established long-term cooperation with diversified customers around the world.Springer Nature is one of the worldâs leading global research, educational and professional publishers, home to an array of respected and trusted brands providing quality content through a range of innovative products and services. Springer Nature is the worldâs largest academic book publisher, publisher of the worldâs most influential journals and a pioneer in the field of open research. The company numbers almost 13,000 staff in over 50 countries and has a turnover of approximately EUR 1.5 billion. Springer Nature was formed in 2015 through the merger of Nature Publishing Group, Palgrave Macmillan, Macmillan Education and Springer Science+Business Media. Find out more: www.springernature.comStarkey Hearing Technologies is world leader in the design, development and distribution of comprehensive hearing solutions. We believe in using superior hearing technology to create meaningful connections between people and their worlds.

Whether it's our industry-leading lineup of invisible hearing aids, the way we took on the challenge of listening comfortably in noisy environments, or our wireless product options including Haloâ¢â our Made for iPhoneÂ® hearing aid â we're continually innovating smaller, easier and better ways to hear. It was Starkey Hearing Technologies that created the industryâs first in-canal hearing aid and first custom, digital and fully programmable invisible hearing aid. We were also the first to use nanotechnology in hearing aids, making hearing aids waterproof, and to begin tackling the biggest challenge wearers have historically faced â hearing in noise.The State Key Laboratory of ISN is the high-level scientific research base in the field of communication in China and the high-level talents training base. Relying mainly on the national key discipline "communication and information system", and supported by the disciplines "signal and information processing", "cryptography", and "military communication studies", the Laboratory is orientated to high-level applied basic research in the field of communication. It makes researches chiefly on theories and key technologies of new-type communication networks, including new concepts and new systems of communication network and exchange, the theory and methods of source-channel coding and network coding, the theory and methods of high-speed information transmission, the theory and technology of information security, and special kinds of communication system.

The Laboratory has undertaken over 100 national-grade research projects from the national "973 Program", "863 Program", the National Natural Science Foundation, and the national defense advance research. It has born a batch of representative fruits in the research on the broad-band wireless self-organized network, the high-speed exchange structure and system of the high-performance broad-band information network, high-efficient real-time image compression coding, high-speed wireless transmission and coding technique, and the design and application of high-security codes. It has won 1 Second National Technology Invention Award, 2 Second National Science and Technology Progress Awards, 7 provincial/ministerial-level science and technology awards, and 1 National Friendship Award.
